topic.title: Apples
topic.shortdesc: Apples are a widely favored fruit with numerous varieties such as red, green, and yellow. Known for their rich vitamin content beneficial to health, they have been enjoyed globally for millennia. It's recommended to wash them before consumption to remove any pesticide residues.

body.p: Apple xs v as d are one of the most popular fruits in the world, there are many different types of apples including red, green, and yellow ones. Apples have been cultivated for thousands of years and are eaten by people all over the globe. Not only are apples delicious, but they also contain many vitamins that are good for health. However, it is important to wash them before eating because pesticides might still be on the skin.
